site.title: Agrotech Mexico 2024
site.description: Our exhibition is designed for the agribusiness sector comprising the entire value chain, from production, industrialization and marketing of agricultural products, to increase its specialization and competitiveness by moving towards Agribusiness through the adoption of technologies such as Artificial Intelligence, Big Data, Blockchain, Automation, Drones, Logistics, and many more.

home.presale: Buy your tickets with a special presale price
home.why_participate_1: Show your product in the second most important consumer region of the country
home.why_participate_2: Learn about the new trends in the sector and participate in the program of conferences and workshops
home.why_participate_3: Expand your business network through B2B and B2C meetings
home.why_participate_4: Promote your brand through the event media coverage
